title: PM grieved over death of founder of PTI’s AJK chapter
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 28 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday expressed grief over the death of Raja Mussaddiq Khan, the founder of Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf’s Azad Kashmir chapter.
“Saddened to learn of the passing of Raja Mussaddiq Khan, founder member of PTI AJK,” the prime minister said in a tweet.
Imran Khan said, “He was one of those overseas Pakistanis who joined PTI when I was in political wilderness.”
The prime minister extended his condolences and prayers to the family of Raja Mussaddiq Khan.
